heading: Identification
text:
All business vehicles, advertising, websites and stationery used in connection with a master plumber
  business shall display prominently the full name of the licensee, the words “N.Y.C. licensed plumber,” the licensee’s number and
  the licensee’s business address. If the business is conducted under a trade name, or by a partnership or corporation, the trade name,
  partnership or corporate name shall be placed immediately above the full name or names of the licensed master plumber or
  licensed master plumbers to whom the plates were issued.
